| Package              | Path                  | Description                                      |
|----------------------|-----------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| api                  | api/                  | NestJS backend with CQRS, event sourcing, Stripe |
| dashboard            | dashboard/            | Next.js 14 brand management platform             |
| brand-embed-plugin   | brand-embed-plugin/   | React white-label booking embed for brand sites  |
| types                | types/                | Shared TypeScript/Zod type definitions           |
| map                  | map/                  | Utility package for map operations               |
| cart-prices          | utils/cart-prices/    | Pricing calculation utilities                    |
| qa-e2e-tests         | qa-e2e-tests/         | Playwright end-to-end test suite                 |
| common-infra         | common-infra/         | Shared infrastructure configurations             |
| typesense-sync-worker| typesense-sync-worker/| Search index synchronization worker              |
